name: Heat grill on high. Thread 3 shrimp on each skewer; season with salt and pepper. Dipping sauce

steps.step: Mix remaining ingredients in a bowl. Grill shrimp until cooked through, about 3 minutes per side.
Serve with dipping sauce on the side.
